thread.title: As Good As It Gets - James L. Brooks
thread.title_full: As Good As It Gets - James L. Brooks

title: As Good As It Gets - James L. Brooks
text: It gets better and better with every viewing! by notquitesane This is a terrific film, and one that should not be missed. To be honest, there are a few lines of dialog here and there that feel a tad unnatural, but that's easy to forgive, because it's such a wonderful movie. Greg Kinnear, always great, is a gem here. I highly recommend it. ONE OF THE BEST!!! PERIOD!! by animatman James L. Brooks scored a big "10" with this one. Jack is brilliant, as the rest of the cast in this great scripted film. If you haven't seen this, Please!!!! rent it NOW!! If you have seen it, Well??? Isn't it time to see it again??? super good
